name: Shape Shooter (itch)
description:
Controls:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Aim

Increase score to 500 in one life and power ups will start spawning at the centre.

P to restart

Please go fullscreen

Made for the MGSA Comp H game jam: http://makegamessa.com/discussion/4094/competition...

Link to more info: http://makegamessa.com/discussion/4138/comp-h-shap...
